test.instr: (:ins (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white) (sort Y airconditioner)))) (:cons_not (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y closet)))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort Y sofa))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue) (sort Y television))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X bottle))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X yellow) (sort Y closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X red) (sort Y refrigerator))) )
test.nl: The white remotecontrol must be on the airconditioner. Do not take out the black bottle from the closet. There is a yellow remotecontrol on the sofa. The door of the washmachine is closed. Open the washmachine. Put the blue can on the television. Pick up a bottle. Put the yellow remotecontrol in the closet. Put a book which is red on the refrigerator.
